Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory0.png'}
{2: '?', 3: '【kuroname】... 【kuroname】!'}
{3: 'Someone is calling your name...'}
{2: '(Struggle to open your eyes)', 3: '10', 4: '(So sleepy...)', 5: '6'}
{2: '?????', 3: '...All vital signs are normal now. The patient is still not awake probably because the excessive adenosine accumulation in the brain is causing a physiological imbalance...'}
{2: '?????', 3: 'In summary, this human lacks sleep.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryZhengyanNew.prefab', 2: '3'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory524.jpg'}
{3: 'You see the ceiling of the Star of Life. How familiar.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Hippocrates', 3: "Are you awake? What's your name?", 4: '1'}
{3: 'The doctor frowns and takes out a small flashlight, shining into your eyes.'}
{2: 'Hippocrates', 3: "...The pupils are responding. Now, answer me, what's your name?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Hippocrates', 3: 'Fully conscious, reactions are normal, and vital signs are stable... Looks like the recovery is going well.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Hippocrates', 3: "I don't need to prepare for emergency measures.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'What happened to me?', 3: '22'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: '...Commandant, you had been working non-stop for days at the Science Council Testing Ground, and collapsed from exhaustion.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Hippocrates', 3: "And there's another one over there. Even your noises can't wake him up.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'She pulls open the curtain on one side, revealing the unconscious Asimov.'}
{3: "Aside from the last time when the Hetero Tower rose and Babylonia fell into chaos, it's the first time you have seen Asimov in a truly deep sleep."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Hippocrates', 3: 'The outpatient nurse freaked out when she saw you two. She brought you straight to me.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Hippocrates', 3: 'Even in dreams, you were shouting about "Inver-Devices" and "connection experiments".', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Hippocrates', 3: 'Staying awake for too long really messes with your brain. I would be seeing you in the mental institute if you came a little later.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'I know it, I really do.', 3: '34', 4: 'But the experiments matter more.', 5: '35'}
{2: 'Hippocrates', 3: 'Do you? Then why did you force open the Sleeping Pod and escape—just like Teddy and that Mika girl did?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Hippocrates', 3: 'The experiments must be so important that you had to hack the system to force open the Sleeping Pod and escape—just like Teddy and that Mika girl did.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'The doctor crosses her arms and sneers.'}
{2: 'Well, not exactly—', 3: '39'}
{3: 'A massive noise comes from next door before you can finish your words.'}
{3: 'A tiny figure storms in, wielding a gigantic Blast Hammer.'}
{2: 'Karenina', 3: 'I thought she would be here!', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Hippocrates', 3: 'Alright, here come the repairs for the three Construct Sleeping Pods, plus—this door.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Hippocrates', 3: "I'll send the bill to the Engineering Force.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Just as Karenina is about to say something, her terminal suddenly flickers. After reading the message, her expression darkens.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Karenina', 3: '...Teddy is stuck in Gestalt.', 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory16.jpg'}
{1: 'Science Council, Testing Ground'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Mika', 3: "...That's the whole story. All the experiment data and subsequent details are in this folder.", 4: '1'}

{1: '1', 2: 'Karenina', 3: 'So, you attempted eight connections using the second version of the external interface model, trying to find a better solution, and then after the ninth connection, Teddy suddenly lost contact?', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Mika', 3: 'That is correct.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Mika', 3: "Her vitals are stable, and there's no sign of her M.I.N.D. being contaminated, but she's definitely not sending any signals back.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Mika', 3: "I suspect she's trapped somewhere in Gestalt.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Asimov', 3: '...Trace the location where she sent the last signal.', 4: '1'}
{3: "Asimov approaches from behind, looking as refreshed as if he'd never known fatigue."}
{2: 'Asimov', 3: 'Try to locate her last position. 【kuroname】, prepare for immersion.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Asimov', 3: 'Teddy likely discovered another "breach" section, and after infiltrating, got stuck there for unknown reasons.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Asimov', 3: 'I can\'t predict what\'s in the "breach". Mika and I will monitor any sudden events. Keep in touch.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Understood.', 3: '73'}
{2: 'Asimov', 3: 'Be careful out there.', 4: '1'}
